{{Wireless embedded system |brand=IP-COM |model=EP9 |revision=(Mesh) |series=AC1200 |fcc_date=08/03/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tenda |type=wireless system, mesh node |fcc_id=2ABZMEP9 |pcb_id=10036723 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FNT |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FNT |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FNT |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BRH;RTL8812BRH, I4A37P3 GI14N; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=IP-COM_XXXXXX }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Enterprise Mesh WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.ip-com.com.cn/en/product/EP9.html}} "10036723" and "V1.2" is silkscreened on the antenna board. {{See also|Tenda Mesh3f|Tenda Mesh3s|Tenda}} The FCC entry for the [[IP-COM EW9]] also covered a version of this device :which was identical except that it was missing the switch circuitry. IP-COM appears to have re-designed the device to completely remove :the switch circuitry and has had it re-certified under its own FCC ID. ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[IP-COM EP9]] *[[IP-COM EW9]] __NOTOC__
